WRITING.TITLE: Blizzlike Private servers in a list. From Vanilla to WOD!
WRITING.TEXT: For people looking for a decent private server to play on here is list of the servers. I played on most of them atleast a couple of hours. If I missed one. You can place it in the comments! Vanilla : Kronos and Nostalrius. Both are very good scripted servers and have an English speaking community. http://www.kronos-wow.com/ https://en.nostalrius.org/ TBC : 1) Excalibur.. http://www.excalibur-wow.com/ Very good community with a playerbase of 800+ active players. 2) Vengeance wow. I don't know much about is. I read about it and it's a low populated server. But I think the scripting is not bad. https://www.vengeancewow.com/ WOTLK: 1) Dalaran WoW. for Pve players that want a well scripted server. It has a bit lower playerbase but it's a very good server with friendly people! And you can do RDF from 15-80 without a problem! And not to forget it's a progression server! :) http://www.dalaran-wow.com/ 2) Warmane. For people that don't care about buggs, want fast leveling (x7) and want to do PvP against donation geared people. https://www.warmane.com/ (I don't really like it sorry) Cata : there is only 1 good server I can think of and that is Atlantiss WoW. This is the server I'm currently playing on. And it's really good. With well scripted quests etc.. http://atlantiss.eu/ MOP: If you really want to play MOP there 2 servers. 1) Pandashan. It's already out for a couple of years. And scripting is.. Euuhm.. Most dungeons work and raids. But once you are in Pandaria. Be ready to grind mops till level 90. https://pandashan.com/us/index 2) WoW Freakz: It was a cataclysm server a couple of months ago and it was well scripted. Now they went to MOP. The scripting is decent and most of the MOP dungeons are already scripted. There is only 1 thing that is a bit mehh. Most of the community is.. A language that is not speaking English. WOD: Now for the last expansion. There are 2 server that are coming to my mind. 1) Ashran. It's already out for couple of months and it's playable but if you don't care about the many bugs. The server rates are also x5. The playerbase here is good with a stable 1000 + players. http://www.ashran.com/ 2) Hellscream-WoW. It's a beginning server that is really wants to script everything before releasing Draenor. You can go to level 90 but then you have to wait till they release Draenor. I think it's a promising server and in a couple of years it will become a bit more populated then it is now. The playerbase now is around 50+ players online. And with the time it will come more populated. http://www.hellscream-wow.com/ And don't forget have much fun in Azeroth! :)
Join Dalaran! :p

Take Dalaran-WoW. I came from Molten(Warmane) a year ago before Moltdown and it's a really great server. Nice people and there aren't many bugs while questing. And if you have a friend you can even get triple xp with the Recruit a friend offer! There is a population around 1k-2.2k :)
I would say.. They are both not good. They are too buggy to play on. If you really want to choose one. I would recommend Hellscream.
I have a level 82 paladin on Atlantiss if you want to trade

WRITING.TITLE: When do I use Pass #233; compos #233; and Imparfait?
WRITING.TEXT: I have exam French tomorrow but It's hard for me to see the difference in long sentences like this one For example: #171; Lorsque, il y a maintenant 5 ans de cela, nous (d #233;m #233;nager) \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ , ma copine et moi, nous (penser) \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ avoir (d #233;couvrir) \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ l #8217;appartement id #233;al. Situ #233; dans un quartier #233;l #233;gant et excentr #233;, ce bel appartement nous (offrir) \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ toutes les garanties de qualit #233;. Nous (souhaiter) \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ y emm #233;nager au plus vite. Nous (signer) \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ alors le bail et le propri #233;taire nous (remettre) \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ les cl #233;s de l #8217;appartement en question. Cependant, nous (devoir) \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ rapidement d #233;chanter, quand nous (s #8217;apercevoir) \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ que le quartier ( #234;tre) \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ beaucoup plus bruyant que nous ne l #8217;avions pens #233; initialement. #187; #8203; Can someone help me to fill the gaps here and tell me why I need to use Imp/PC? :)

WRITING.TITLE: How do I know when I need to use discours indirect (imp #233;ratif)?
WRITING.TEXT: Example sentences: 1) Le patron m #8217;a conseill #233; : #171; Ne t #8217;inqui #232;te pas trop mais veille #224; ce que ta carri #232;re ne subisse pas le contrecoup de tes d #233;boires avec la justice. #187; #8203; 2) Le mois dernier, le pr #233;sident m #8217;a demand #233; : #171; Que penses-tu de la situation #233;conomique actuelle? #187;. Plus tard dans la conversation, il m #8217;a aussi demand #233; : #171; Penses-tu que la politique mon #233;taire suivie par la B.C.E. am #232;nera les institutions financi #232;res #224; investir dans des secteurs productifs ? #187; #8203; Do I need to use imp #233;ratif here or not?

So if I get it right -- gt; in the next sentence: Le professeur a demand #233; #224; ses #233;tudiants : #171; Pouvez-vous me faire parvenir au plus t #244;t les r #233;sultats de vos recherches sur le terrain ? #187; Vous makes it a subject so -- gt; Le prof a demand #233; #224; ses #233;tudians qu'ils pouvions-nous lui faire parvenir au plus t #244;t les r #233;sultats de nos recherches sur le terrain Correct me if i'm wrong :)
This was the answer I was looking for! Thank you, kind stranger of the internet! \^\^

Thank you for explaining this to me! \^-\^ So I'm right for the second sentence -- gt; \[Le mois dernier, le pr #233;sident m #8217;a demand #233; : #171; Que penses-tu de la situation #233;conomique actuelle? #187;. Plus tard dans la conversation, il m #8217;a aussi demand #233; : #171; Penses-tu que la politique mon #233;taire suivie par la B.C.E. am #232;nera les institutions financi #232;res #224; investir dans des secteurs productifs ? #187;\] \-- gt; Le pr #233;sident m'a demand #233; que je pensais de la situation ... Il m'a aussi demand #233; que je pensais de la politque mon #233;taire... Is the last thing right? I feel like I'm missing something..
Okay, thank you for your help! Really appreciate it!! :)

WRITING.TEXT: I fail at knowing which time to use in a sentence. Can someone explain to me the rules? I know that after Indicatif pr #233;sent that we need to use Pr #233;sent or Pass #233; compos #233; but I don't know what time to use after Pass #233; compos #233; or Plus-que-parfait.

I really recommend you to try ESO! I was also a wow player for years.. But Bfa killed the game for me and I dont have that much time to play classic wow. Eso is a one time purchase and when you buy a subscription you will get acces to all DLC ( exept the newest one) but that doesnt matter because all zones have the same level. Game feels a bit like wow as an RPG but has better story telling.. For the rest you should find enough information on the internet! And yes the game is quite populated! And even after years it is still growing! I can also recommend you SWTOR if you are looking for a wow like clone!

Bit like wow! While leveling up you can do normal dungeons with the dungeon finder and at max level you can also do the 'mythic' Version of them. Besides that, there are also delves in the open world (soloable dungeons) and also public dungeons, same as delves but for groups in the open world. Each dungeon has also item sets you can collect and Besides dungeons there are also raids! Finally, In each zone there are also world bosses that drop Gold and loot! Overall, the only big difference with wow is the combat system. Here, you are free to be who you want to be. Like a warrior with mage spells or a rogue that tanks dungeons with a two-handed sword! Just try it out! :) if ur pc you can buy the game for like 7-9 euro on g2a etc...
Yup, the new content for this year will likely be in Skyrim! Also, why not just try both GW2 and ESO? And just see what you like most! :)
Let the man be happy #128514;
It is quite funny. They probably placed him close to the camera/mic
Oh, well mobs are scaled to a certain level (max level) and you can level beyond that. So after a while you will feel stronger

WRITING.TITLE: ERROR WOW51900319 makes the game unplayable for me
WRITING.TEXT: Wow is unplayable for me. I tried everything, 2 months of looking for a solution and changing settings. Nothing! Before, I played WoW for 10 years and never had a problem until now. This problem occurs on both retail and classic! **What I tried:** \- Deleting addons/reset UI \- Change ingame settings (network + graphics) \- Repair/uninstall game + battle net \- Play on my laptop (nope same issue!) \- Updating drivers \- Changing settings in virus scanner (Malwarebytes) \- Reset network device \- Router reset + factory reset \- Changing router (ISP gave me a new router just for this problem!) \- Changing the IP address \- Port forwarding \- Changed Firewall settings (on both pc and router) \- DNS Flush in command prompt \- Talked with support (the only thing they recommend was playing on a VPN.. lol) \- Try to play on VPN (same problem, DC after 1 to 10 min) #8203; Does anyone have a solution? If not, guess its the end of WoW for me. This is the only game(s) I ever had this problem with (not even other Battle net games have this issue)
Yeah already done that. That's why they even changed my router haha
Yeah they dont know... they said I need to use VPN (doesn't work either)
